services.name: Tools & System Settings
services.description: This file contains shortcuts to manipulate system settings and useful commands. (enable/disable screensaver, PC speaker or swap space; timed shutdown). Most commands need root privileges which are gained through sudo (kdesudo/gksudo).

service.name: PC Speaker
service.description: Enable/disable the speaker system-wide. Root access is gained through $SUDO.

service.name: Shutdown Timer (1h)
service.description: Shut down the system 1 hour delayed.

service.name: Swap Space
service.description: Activate/deactivate all swap partitions (useful for flushing swapped data).

service.name: Update Package Cache
service.description: Update package cache, download upgradable packages, delete obsolete ones.
service.startcommand: $SUDO bash -c 'aptitude update && aptitude -y -d safe-upgrade && aptitude autoclean'

service.name: Compositing
service.description: KDE4 Compositing effects - submitted by Lord Spectre

service.name: Xbindkeys
service.description: Map commands to keyboard or mouse buttons - submitted by Scoolasse

service.name: DPMS
service.description: Turn the screen off/on - submitted by Epimetheus11
